name: Pick the Tool
description:
It’s time to pick up your tools and get moving!

Make sure you choose the car with the right tool attached for the job. Want to get through the sand, how about the plough? Need to make your way across the overgrown grass, choose the lawnmower. Have the urge to smash down some walls, grab yourself a bulldozer.

But remember this is still a race so you better be thinking fast so you don’t get left in the dust by your opponents with the wrong vehicle.

Will you be able to choose the right tool for what you need?

Pick the Tool features:
- Choose your tool
- Plough through the obstacles
- Claim victory over your opponent
publishers: Clap Clap Desenvolvimento de Jogos Ltda ME
